articles.author: JAKE COYLE | AP Film Writer
articles.title: 'The Boy and the Heron,' Miyazaki's final film, soars to number one at the box office - WKRC TV Cincinnati
articles.description: For the first time in Hayao Miyazaki's decades-spanning career, the 82-year-old Japanese anime master is No. 1 at the North American box office.
articles.content: NEW YORK (AP) For the first time in Hayao Miyazaki's decades-spanning career, the 82-year-old Japanese anime master is No. 1 at the North American box office. Miyazaki's latest enchantment, "The Boy … [+4860 chars]
